review: Indocin is the best drug for sciatica in my case (l5 s1 disc herniation). I tried many NSAIDs  none worked except indocin
indomethacin helped with severe hamstring stiffness and severe pain including sciatica. I still have pain but it is bearable. Unlike when I tried naproxen and ibuprofen, they didn't help at all.
Indocin (indomethacin):Indocin is fairly good but I am uncertain of drug reactions.
